content.rendered:
With the release of the new iPhone range looming, the older variants are still booming so here’s our iPhone 11 Pro Max review, looking at all it’s best features. As the highest specification device from Apple in 2020, it’s easy to understand why this phone is so popular. From its price to its design, there’s so many improvements from the 2018 range.

 

What keeps it going?

Keeping the Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max powered is actually a 3969mAh battery pack. Whilst you may be thinking that this isn’t as large as a lot of other batteries on the market, it can do far better than most of them. On average, you’ll be able to get around 80 hours of power on a single charge. This means you can go about your day without even having to think about a dead battery. For those times when you do run a little low, the phone supports wireless charging and fast charging 18W for a super quick power up.

Having a variety of memory options to choose from is becoming more and more important. We keep millions of photos, videos, apps, emails and so much more on our smartphones. That’s why you’re able to purchase this device in either 64GB, 256GB or 512GB. Every single one of these options is huge and will allow you to enjoy the majority of your 24 month contract with no worry. If you do ever find that you’re running a little low on memory, you’ll need to use some form of cloud storage, such as iCloud as there’s no memory card slot.

Chipsets act as the brains of a smartphone. With this in mind, Apple designed the A13 Bionic, the fastest chipset in a smartphone. With this component running it, the 11 Pro Max is going to offer it’s users an experience unlike ever before. Stream without buffering. Download without interruptions. Even download in a matter of seconds. Not only does the A13 give you fast speeds though. This chip also ensures that the battery puts power to the places you use often, rather than wasting it on pointless areas. It even works with the camera system to give you the best photos.

 

Design Features

Sticking with a very classic feature of Apple smartphones, the iPhone 11 Pro Max has a high end, all glass design. By having this glass backing, you’re able to enjoy a very expensive feeling design. It gives a glossy finish that really catches the light. With such an eye catching design, you’ll want to be sure that you enjoy it to your full potential. That’s why there’s very little on the back of the phone. With only the Apple logo and the camera setup, you’ve got the rest of the phone to show off.

To match this flashy design, you’ve got some flashy colours too. Choose from the typical Apple colours with Space Grey and Silver. These are both incredibly understated colours that give you an overall expensive feel. They’re perfect for anyone who just wants to throw a case on the phone or even keep it professional. Whilst staying high end and office acceptable, the Gold and Midnight Green options add a little more excitement. These are both newer colours that give you a fun yet high end design all over. No matter which colour you choose, you’ll get to enjoy the same glossy finish.

Even if the back of a phone is spotless, the display still needs to be up to standards, after all, it is a touch screen smartphone. On the iPhone 11 Pro Max, you can enjoy a 6.5 inch super Retina XDR OLED display and it’s an impressive one. Apple has used the Retina OLED displays for some time now as it gives them super vibrant colours whilst staying a little different to competitors. This large screen gives you a huge viewing area with only a small notch at the top, which holds the speaker and camera.

 

Best iPhone 11 Pro Max Deals

Here at Fonehouse, we like to make sure we’ve got the very best iPhone 11 Pro Max deals by giving you affordable prices for value packed contracts. To do just this, we will pair a lot of our deals with a range of cashback offers. Be that redemption of automatic, you’ll manage to save huge amounts on your mobile phone contract. By offering two different types, you can choose how much you save and exactly how you save it. Of course, a low price isn’t the only thing that makes an amazing phone contract.

To push the quality of our contracts even more, we work with the very best networks in the UK. Each and every network available will give you top coverage and super fast speeds, no matter which plan you choose. They also add a few different extras to help you make the most of your plan. From free subscriptions to huge discounts and even giveaways, there’s something for everyone to enjoy. Make the most of your mobile phone contract by purchasing one of our high value offers. Get unlimited minutes, unlimited texts and huge data bundles for an affordable monthly cost.

 

Overall Review

Since its release last year, the iPhone 11 Pro Max has been at the top of the market. As a smartphone with so many different features, that’s not really a surprise. In this day and age, we ask for larger screens, huge camera systems and fast speeds. This device gives us just that! It’s honestly outstanding as to just how many amazing parts you can find in this smartphone. Apple has seriously raised the bar with this one. In our opinion, purchasing the 2019 Pro Max is just as good as getting your hands on the new iPhone.

 

If you want to get your hands on this device after reading our iPhone 11 Pro Max review, we’ve got the perfect news for you. Make sure you check out our best iPhone 11 Pro Max deals to get the highest value, and most affordable, offers around.
